chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

Interface BasicScriptEngineController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScriptEngine

    public interface BasicScriptEngineController

    This interface extends functionality of the standard Java ScriptEngine interface.

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

        throws ScriptException

        Throws:
        ScriptException - on any script exceptions
